name: The Seed (LazyLycan)
description:
You play as a rabbit who wants to return to his burrow but on the way you encounter threatening creatures and a destroyed forest. It is your choice whether you sow the seeds you find or leave the forest as it is. Whatever you do though don't let yourself get caught by those... creatures. They are the ones destroying your home and a small being like you can do nothing against them.

This game was created during Global Game Jam 2020 under the theme "repair". We hope you enjoy this short experience! If you have any feedback feel free to leave a comment.


Controls

Walk || AD
Plant Seeds || LEFT MOUSE


Credits

Tina Wolfrum || Game Design, Programming,

Teresa Wolfrum || Level Design, 2D Art, Animations
